item.description: "Found a student sitting alone in class while the teacher was on his brake. During that period the apple that was left on the desk had a piece bitten off. The only person that had access during that time was the student."
"A student borrowed a pencil from the teacher during a exam, but even after giving his exam to the teacher, he didn't return the pencil."
"During the lesson the student cheated on a tournament that the group organized. The game played was tic tac toe."
"While leaving the class the student left every window open, so the school has to pay more for."
"The Students organized a exam cheating method by sneezing the morse code, which lead them to not writing it on their own."
"During the break, he went and broke his college friends favourite pen, on which he was to sad to participate on the whole lecture."
"The student lied about going to the toilet during the class, instead of that he went and bought a snickers for him and his friend"
"Student was found guilty of hiding a cheat sheet under his ear during the exam"
"While working on the computer, the student turned the screen upside down by pressing CTRL + ALT + 'ArrowKey'(Doesn't work on windows 11) "
"Brought a hamster for the exam to help him guess the right answers (somehow it worked)"
"Was caught stealing leaves from the plants inside the class and on the corridor"
"While writing the exam, the student sneezed on the paper, because of that the teacher got sick after checking his work"
"Organized a illegal 'Rock, Paper, Scissors' game during the break"
"Took bets from other students, on who will win the 'Rock, Paper, Scissors' game"
"Went on convincing everyone why the 'Morbius' movie was the best movie ever"
"After closing the school cafeteria, started selling fruits and sweets to his friends"
"The student opened the wrong window on the advent calendar during school, because he was greedy and wanted all of them"
"Was caught after his lessons, taking water into a 5l bottle inside the toilets. He replied 'I need it to water my plants'"
"Wanted to make a good act for everyone by ordering a pizza to share with everyone. Sadly the pizza had pineapple on it."

"During a math lesson, he had to solve a equation which had a inequality at the end that was 10 + 10 = 11 + 11. He said that in the end it is true, because 10 + 10 equals to 20, while 11 + 11 equals to 20 too "
